Activists at the Pennsylvania school objected to Mr. Birgeneau 's role in the forceful dispersion of a 2011 Occupy protest at Berkeley , and they sought to condition his appearance on his compliance with a series of restorative measures that included a full accounting of one 's violation , an open letter about what you learned and a pledge to become a leader in how universities ensure that protesters ' rights are respected .
